Voluntary Socialism bụ ọrụ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke onye America na - Francis Dashwood Tandy (1867-1913)
Nke mbụ e bipụtara na 1896, ọtụtụ ndị ọgba aghara n'otu n"otu, gụnyere Clarence Lee Swartz, minarchists Robert Nozick na onye nnwere onwe aka ekpe Roderick T
Long, bụ ndị kwuru na "ọtụtụ n-aga nʼihu na echichendị ọgba aghara nke ahịa taa adịlarị ihe akaebe na Tandy".

Tandy bụ onye otu "Denver Circle", otu ndị ikom jikọtara na Benjamin Tucker ma nye aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ Liberty. N'okwu mmalite nke Voluntary Socialism, ọ kwupụtara ebumnuche ya "inye nkọwa zuru oke nke [Afọ ofufo] n'ihe ndị kachasị mkpa"
Iji mezuo nke ahụ, isi nke otu ruo anọ na-akọwa ntọala maka anarchism nke Tandy, na'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na Max Stirner nakwa Herbert Spencer
Isi nke ise ruo iri na anọ na-ekpuchi ebe ndị a kapịrị ọnụ, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ nchebe onwe onye, echiche ọrụ nke uru, ụlọ akụ, njem, na atụmatụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
A raara akwụkwọ ahụ nye Benjamin Tucker, "onye edemede ya doro anya na nkatọ ya siri ike emeela ọtụtụ ihe iji kpochapụ igwe ojii nke nkwenkwe ụgha a na enwekari na akụ na ụba".
